overview: The best of me is a video installation consisting of two projections exhibited  in different rooms. Each of the two videos is a replacement of the famous  videos of Ricardo Lopez, the so-called Bjork stalker who in 1996 filmed himself  in his house while building a bomb to send to the Icelandic singer, with  whom he was obsessed. Twenty hours of videos shot over 9 months in  which his thoughts, his daily life and his activities are documented in a sort  of ante litteram vlog. The best of me shows two sides of the footage that are  often ignored: on one hand its experimentation with the device, its use of  the video camera as an expression of the self; on the other hand, the few  moments in which Lopez does not speak and stops to reflect. Together, the  two projections account for a material of great theoretical interest that goes  beyond the simple initial shock.
title: THE BEST OF ME
